Pattern.HelpText: 8-16 characters, containing 3 out of 4 of the following: Lowercase characters, uppercase characters, digits (0-9), and one or more of the following symbols: @ # $ % ^ & * - _ + = [ ] { } | \ : ' , ? / ` ~ " ( ) ; .
The user ID you have entered is not valid. It must begin with a letter or a digit and it can contain letters, digits and the following symbols: _ -
